definitions.title: n. pr. div.
definitions.body: god of men of Avva, 2Ki 17:31; name otherwise unknown, cf. Sch:COT ad loc.; LXXB th\n )Eblazer, LXXL )Eblaiezer, A )Abaazer kai\ th\n Naibav; Thes comp. Mand. denom. nbaz = [[נבאז]] (Cod. Nasar. Norberg.) Codd. give variant [[נבחן]] cf. Baer:ad loc. Frensdorff:Mas. Magna i. 306.
